summary: Federal agencies' efforts to acquire IT have often cost more than expected, taken longer, and produced systems that failed to perform. IT acquisitions and operations management has been on our High Risk List since 2015. In this report, we profile 16 critical IT acquisitions, describing risks to their cost and schedule, and more. For example, the FBI plans to spend $1.6 billion over 14 years...
title: Information Technology: Key Attributes of Essential Federal Mission-Critical Acquisitions
